text: 4-Methyl-α-ethylaminopentiophenone (4-MEAP) is a designer drug of the cathinone class. It is a higher homolog of 4-methylpentedrone (4-MPD) with an ethyl group in place of the methyl group. 4-MEAP has been found in samples of drugs sold as 4-MPD. In the United States, 4-MEAP is a Schedule I Controlled Substance. ==References== Category:Designer drugs Category:Cathinones
title: 4-Methyl-α-ethylaminopentiophenone
